title: Best Crypto to buy now as Metaplanet scoops 136 BTC for $15.2M
description: Metaplanet has been adding to its Bitcoin holdings at an aggressive rate in 2025. The Tokyo-listed firm recently added to the portfolio 136 BTC worth $15.2 million, raising the company’s total holdings to 20,136 BTC. This is a large move, considering it only came a week after Metaplanet’s last purchase of 1,009 BTC.  As a […]
